venue.name: Best Western Executive Court Inn & Conf. Ctr

item.description: I am so excited to have Dr Steve Blake presenting July 31!  He is coming to the east coast from Hawaii and we are lucky enough to have him stop here!  Check out his website  Naturalhealthwizards.com.  He also has a page that lists all the talks that he can present.  Check it out and let me know if there are any that you want to hear.  I bought his Herb Doctor program and it is awesome!  Please bring an organic raw vegan dish enough for 6-8 people.  If you are new and not sure what to bring...a salad, fruit or veggie, is always good!

group.name: Manchester Raw Vegan Food Meetup Group

item.name: Sunday July 31, 2011 Dr Steve Blake!!
